publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2896 Hugh Henry: The Draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Consequential Modifications and Amendments) Order 2005—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Consequential Modifications and Amendments) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*

S2M-2896 Hugh Henry: The Draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Consequential Modifications and Amendments) Order 2005—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Fire ( Scotland) Act 2005 (Consequential Modifications and Amendments) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson
